levelDescription: The door closes behind you, leaving you alone in the darkness. Suddenly, everything lights up and you find yourself on the beach. There's a Lighthouse right infront of you up the hill(NORTH), a shipwreck by the coast(EAST) and what looks to be a shed to your left(WEST) by the seaside. Which way do you decide to go?

While making your way up the hill you encounter a gate blocking your path from going to the lighthouse. The gate appears to be very sturdy despite looking to be well over two hundred years old. There's also spikes at the top that makes it impossible to climb over
You stand outside the lighthouse, do you decide to go?
This is the lighthouse. There's a staircase that leads up to the 2nd floor.
This is the top floor in the lighthouse. There looks to be some sort of old machine that requires you to put in a key.
You stand outside the shed, do you decide to go in?.
You stand inside the shed. Itâ€™s filled with what looks to be a bunch of old fisherman gear. There's a ladder leading down to the basement(NORTH)
You find yourself in the basement of the shed. There seems to be nothing but bunch of old junk. Though you see something glimmer in the distant, do you want to inspect it?
You see a shipwreck in the distant, do you decide to explore it?
You find yourself inside the old rustic shipwreck. The boat seems to be very old from the looks of it. The captains cabin is to your right(EAST)
You are currently inside the captains cabin. There's a desk with a piece of paper on it.
